讚談: (さんだん) - praising Buddha/sermon; praise (second of the five gates of mindfulness); style of Buddhistic song of praise, usually praising Buddha, the Bodhisattva, the Buddhistic teachings, etc.; rumor/rumour/hearsay

豁然: (かつぜん) - spread out; broad; all of a sudden
豁然大悟: (かつぜんたいご) - (yoji) suddenly seeing the light; achieving full enlightenment all of a sudden
豆: (tou/mame) - beans , legume (esp. edible legumes or their seeds, such as beans, peas, pulses, etc.), beans, peas; soya bean (Glycine max), soybean, soy; female genitalia (esp. the clitoris); kidney

豆の筋を取る: (まめのすじをとる) - to string peas

豆撒き: (まめまき) - sowing beans (or pulses, etc.); scattering parched beans (to drive out evil spirits)

豆板銀: (まめいたぎん) - name of an Edo-period coin

豆粕: (まめかす) - bean cake; soybean (oil) meal
豆腐: (toufu) - tofu, coalhada de soja, coalhada de feijão
